title: Web Development Practical Skill Enhancement: Instructional Design (ID) Competency Evaluation and Reflection Based on Portfolios

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of foundational instructional design theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Self-assessment achievement of over 70% in at least eight of the twelve instructional design competencies based on IBSTPI and AECT standards

Within a six-month course, learners document three or more software projects in their personal portfolio across design, development, utilization, and execution management phases, and submit answers to at least two reflective questions per phase (e.g., "User requirements considered in the design phase," "Testing methods applied during development").
Revision and enhancement of portfolios at least three times incorporating peer feedback and instructor coaching
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
